entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 162,020Chapters: 65/?Kudos: 493

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story. A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim. To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course! ​He wakes up in a world where he is dead, but Alfred is his living ally. With just seven days until the plot kicks off, Damian dedicates himself to healing the fractured Batfamily, slowly putting the pieces back together. But he can multitask. To prevent the Love Square, he decides to aggressively befriend Marinette Dupain-Cheng the only way a Wayne knows how: by replacing her friends with competent ones and burying her under a mountain of gifts. Who knew purchasing platonic affection required so much cashmere?

entry.title: The Life He Chose in Paris
entry.summary:
Author: Lynna5555

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,592Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 64

Summary: Everyone knows Damian Wayne left Gotham to find himself. What no one knows is that he never planned to return. Years passed. The Batfamily waited-hopeful, worried, quietly unraveling. Damian's rare check-ins were brief, clinical, just enough to prove he was alive. But the truth behind his silence was far softer than anyone imagined. Somewhere along his journey, Damian met Marinette Stone‑Rolling-a brilliant designer with a gentle smile and a warmth that disarmed him more effectively than any blade. With her, love wasn't a weakness. It was inevitable. Paris wasn't the city he chose. She was. Now Damian lives a life built on quiet joy and fierce devotion-a life filled with color, creation, and two little girls who carry Marinette's beautiful hair and his unmistakable green eyes. He never told his family about them. Never told them he'd found something worth staying for. But when the Waynes arrive in Paris for a vacation, the secret he's kept so carefully may be the one thing that shatters the peace he's fought so hard to protect.

entry.title: The Life Beyond Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: Lynna5555

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,538Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 247

Summary: Everyone knows Damian Wayne left Gotham to “find himself.” What no one knows is that he never planned to return. For years, the Batfamily waited—worried, hopeful, and increasingly unsure. His rare check-ins were brief, just enough to prove he was alive. But the truth behind his silence was far gentler than they imagined. During his travels, Damian met Marinette Dupain-Cheng—a talented designer whose warmth disarmed him more easily than any blade. Love wasn’t part of his training, yet with her it felt natural. Effortless. Inevitable. Paris wasn’t the place he chose. She was. What began quietly grew into a life bright enough to eclipse the shadows he carried. For the first time, Damian allowed himself to stay… and he never told his family. Now he lives a life they know nothing about—one filled with color, creation, and a girl who makes him forget the weight of his name. But secrets don’t stay buried forever, and the Batfamily is about to learn that the son they lost didn’t disappear. He simply found a reason not to come home.

entry.title: Dragon AU
entry.summary:
Author: ew_selfish_art

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,127Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 21

Summary: Damian had heard of the beast, the flame-breathing, winged creature. Concern for it's well being consumed him, knowing that there would be many knights and princes attempting to slay it for the prize of the princess it supposedly protected. He wants to observe the dragon, to understand it, and to learn how best to bring back the population of Dragon-Bats he so dearly missed. Instead of being immediately eaten or burned alive, Damian finds himself within the cursed castle of the Dragon, accompanied by a charming but defensive maiden and a talking cat. Damian does not fear the challenge of studying the dragon, but he does fear for his sanity in attempting to unravel the many mysteries hidden within stone walls.

entry.title: Crossover family
entry.summary:
Author: Lynna5555

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 779Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 11

Summary: Lady Gotham has watched her city rise, fall, and rebuild itself through the courage of her Knights. She witnessed Bruce Wayne don the cowl, saw each new protector join his side, and felt every triumph and tragedy that shaped them. But beneath her stone and shadow, worry grew. Her Knights had forgotten how to live. They fought for Gotham so fiercely that they no longer remembered they were human—capable of joy, connection, and a life beyond endless battles. Determined to give them more than duty and sacrifice, Lady Gotham sought help from the only beings powerful enough to intervene: the guardians of the universe, the god of time, and others who shaped destiny itself. Together, they formed a plan. Anyone in danger across the multiverse would be drawn to Gotham—guided, nudged, or pulled—so long as they posed no threat. Lady Gotham handpicked each soul with care, choosing only those who could heal, challenge, or change her Knights for the better. Because she wasn’t just protecting her city anymore. She was protecting her family.

entry.title: Lie Lie Lie
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 159,340Chapters: 54/80Kudos: 766

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng had a grand falling out with Adrien. He had learned the truth, that his father was Hawk Moth and his girlfriend had kept this secret. Chrysalis was dead,her life was spiraling out of despair. Her Maman let her leave with her Uncle Wang, but not to Shanghai. Hey, there is another restaurant opening in Gotham, and Uncle Wang needed a helper. Goodbye, City of Love, and welcome, Capital City of Crime. __________________________________________________________________ Damian Wayne does not get “dumped”. However, given the Wayne Gala is close and his brothers plan to make fun of his being alone, Damian needs a plan of action: a pretend girlfriend. The target? His friend, Maps Mizoguchi. Approaching the raven-haired under the tree, he gives the order for a romantic alliance. But when the girl turns around, it’s not Maps. It’s a confused French transfer student holding a macaron. A lesser man would apologize for the mistake. Damian Wayne? He doubles down. She has the right hair. She is a variable he can control. “You,” he decides, refusing to admit error. “You are an acceptable substitute. Don’t be late.”

entry.title: The Love I Need
entry.summary:
Author: reagan_29

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,356Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 30

Summary: Hey so i hope you enjoy this spinoff from the story “Shes sunshine, she’s grace, she’ll punch you in the face” by Brinxiethebear! this is just my spinoff of what happens after marinette comes back to paris and if this takes place in 2024/2025 and marinette is a competitive dancer! there will be angst when mentioning some akuma attacks (which some i made up) and there will be no smut as i don’t want to write that!please leave comments with tips on how to improve! Marinette is back in Paris but misses Gotham so much, But the part of Gotham she misses is The Wayne’s as they had become such a big part of her life in the past few weeks and she has grown to love them very quickly, While Marinette is back in Paris missing the Wayne’s, The Wayne’s (especially Damian) are also missing Marinette and are starting to plan a surprise visit for over Christmas break. Marinette has suppressed her feelings over her friends leaving her for Lila for a while now but now that they are all friends again she finds herself starting to break. Will she find herself spiraling or will a certain someone be able to help. *Re-named used to be “the aftermath of something new”*

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,971Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 119

Summary: Damian Wayne doesn’t always get to do what he wants. Sometimes he simply has to smile through the unpleasant things, and sometimes the things that start out unpleasant turn out to be the best things in the end. Meeting Marinette occurred during one of those unpleasant things, and he thinks that if he can convince her to stay by his side that all the other unpleasant things he has to do would be much better, and he wouldn’t have to work quite so hard to smile through.

entry.title: Reborn For You
entry.summary:
Author: Fangirl_Who_Died

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,917Chapters: 5/8Kudos: 61

Summary: Marinette wakes up one morning to find out she's been reborn into Maria Grace, a family friend of the Waynes. The kwamis did this–there's no other way than that. But why? And how is she supposed to navigate through life now? And what is her purpose here? Oh, and what about Paris while she's gone?

entry.title: How'd We Meet? Playing Video Games
entry.summary:
Author: AgentofSciFi

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,733Chapters: 57/?Kudos: 565

Summary: Rewrite of "How'd We Meet? Video Games"Hello Ultimate Mecha Strike Players! You are currently one of the top 150 players for your server. You have been entered into an international tournament! Each player will be randomly paired with 6 other people, from all over the world. You will have 10 weeks to prepare before the tournament. May the best Mecha team win!No one could have predicted what one video game tournament would turn into, but it sets these seven kids on a path that would shape the next generation of superheroes.*Tags will be added as I continue on with the story, I don't want to give too much away at the beginning

entry.title: Linked
entry.summary:
Author: Miss_Salt

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,933Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 42

Summary: After discovering the Order of the Guardians temple ruins, Talia Al-Ghul took it upon herself to hunt down the Grand Guardian of the miraculous. Upon locating Master Wang Fu, Talia tortured the feeble man into relinquishing Guardianship of the Miracle Box to her. Before relinquishing Guardianship, Wang Fu informed Talia that the miraculous could only be wielded by the reincarnations of previous miraculous wielders. In other words, Talia wouldn’t be able to wield the miraculous herself and thus, wouldn’t be able to access the wish she desired. However, as the newly appointed Grand Guardian, Talia was privy to the identities of the designated miraculous wielders. Talia first discovered the identity of the Ladybug miraculous wielder, whose name didn’t ring a bell. Talia then moved on to discover the identity of the Black Cat mirauclous wielder, who, in a twist of luck, turned out to be her own son. An underlying sense of dread accompanied Talia’s excitement as she recalled what Wang Fu had told her before his untimely death- that the souls of the Black Cat and Ladybug miraculous wielders were linked. Talia hoped the Ladybug miraculous wielder, Marienette Dupain-Cheng, would be a worthy partner for Damian.
